OOC: Thanks for reminding me of that ability that Rodimus has.

::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

Rodimus and Kup pull up to the railing with the rest of the group.

They both transform to bot mode.

Kup: This Pred-creep is insane...

Rodimus is lookins around, assessing the situation. While doing this he spots a point in the sky where he sees a reflection of the sunlight.

Rodimus: That's odd...

Rodimus activates his advanced optics and zooms his view in on the reflective spot. He sees the eage but spots the unnatural booster pack and rocket launchers.

Rodimus: I think the Predacon has a friend in high places.

Rodimus points up at Myrmidon.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 OOC: The base scanners, if they are your basic sensors would still see
 him as a bird, so he is 'technically' invisible. However he is not
 displaying typical bird-like behavior. So I suppose if your base
 scanners has advance behavior analysis capabilities they may note
 something strange, or someone could just get curious at the eagle
 flying in search patturns. In either case if someone can get a close
 enough look (IE: With binoculars) you would see that he is an eagle
 with a cool boosterpack and small rocket launchers. He still has a
 slight distortion field wich shows him to be a typical avian to
 scanners/sensors.
 
 Note: Hot-rod in the TF:Movie had bionoculars, so I would suspect
 Rodimus has them as well. I am not sure who would have them in your
 group. 
 
 I hope this helps
 
 Preston
 (Myrmidon)
